1133360.name: Wall Jump Stuff
1133360.description:
**Coming Soon - Don't Forget To Wishlist!**


Hi, I have been learning how to make games for a few years now, here is my first release!

I really appreciate your feedback and plan to update this game, so let me know what you would like to see or if you spot any bugs!

Thank you for your interest, I hope you enjoy playing Wall Jump Stuff as much as I enjoyed making it! - Paul Chettle, Fizzy Vortex Games


Wall Jump Stuff is a physics based arcade wall jumping game, you'll need to think fast when positioning your character to navigate obstacles and catch gems

Your character is in a constant state of falling so jumping to the opposing wall or on to an obstacle is the only way to advance

I designed this game to be challenging at first, once you pick up the wall jumping mechanic you should be able to clear obstacles more easily and anticipate how to position your character to better catch the falling gems that are used to unlock more characters

The control is a simple 1 click of the mouse and your character jumps in a predictable arc - but make no mistake - this is not an easy game

There are currently 20 obstacles!, some with variations, that are selected at random and repeat as you ascend the cliff. If you fail a particular obstacle you get another chance at the beginning of your next run to tackle that obstacle before the sequence switches back to random!


Features
- Challenging wall jumping game mechanic
- 1 click to jump
- 20 Obstacles
- 22 Characters
- 3 Boats/Ships
- 63 Steam Achievements
- Steam Cloud Save

Notes: currently there is only mouse support for interacting with the menu system

Trailer Music: Onwards! by Kevin Mueller find his awesome music on Newgrounds
